00014 // BasicService
00015 class BasicConnectService;
00016 class BasicAcceptService;
00017 class BasicService : public lsf::basic::NonCopyable {
00018 public:
00019     static const size_t DEF_SEND_TIMEOUT = 3000; // milli seconds
00020     static const size_t DEF_SEND_BUF_LEN = 1024*1024;
00021     static const size_t DEF_RECV_BUF_LEN = 1024*1024;
00022     friend class lsf::asio::ProactorSerivce;
00023     friend class BasicConnectService;
00024     friend class BasicAcceptService;
00025 
00026 public:
00027     BasicService(conf::ENServiceType service_type) : _service_type(service_type) {}
00028     virtual ~BasicService() { }
00029     bool Run(BasicServer* pserver);
00030 
00031 protected:
00032     // most of time you should not mess with these funcs
00033     virtual void OnSocketRead(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, std::string const& buffer) final;
00034     virtual void OnSocketPeerClose(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket) final;
00035 
00036     // init logic
00037     virtual bool OnInitConfig() = 0;
00038     virtual bool OnInitSocket() = 0;
00039     virtual bool OnRun() { return true; }
00040 
00041     // message cut logic
00042     virtual bool OnGetSingleMessageFromStream(std::string const& buffer, size_t& pos, std::string& message);
00043     virtual bool OnPutSingleMessageIntoStream(std::string & buffer, std::string const& message);
00044 
00045     // connection handler
00046     bool ConnectionSend(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, std::string const& message);
00047     bool ConnectionSend(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, google::protobuf::Message const& proto_msg);
00048     void ConnectionClose(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket);
00049     virtual void OnConnectionCreate(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket) { }
00050     virtual void OnConnectionMessage(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, std::string& message) { }
00051     virtual void OnConnectionPeerClose(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket) { }
00052     virtual void OnConnectionClose(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket) { }
00053 
00054 protected:
00055     conf::ENServiceType _service_type;
00056     BasicServer* _pserver = nullptr;
00057 };
00058 
00060 // BasicAcceptService
00061 class BasicAcceptService : public BasicService {
00062 public:
00063     friend class lsf::asio::ProactorSerivce;
00064     friend class BasicService;
00065 
00066 public:
00067     BasicAcceptService(conf::ENServiceType service_type) : BasicService(service_type) {}
00068     virtual ~BasicAcceptService() {}
00069 
00070 protected:
00071     // most of time you should not mess with these funcs
00072     void OnSocketAccept(lsf::asio::SharedSocket listen_socket, lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket);
00073 
00074     // init logic
00075     virtual bool OnInitConfig();
00076     virtual bool OnInitSocket();
00077 
00078 protected:
00079     conf::AcceptService _service_config;
00080 };

00083 // BasicService
00084 class BasicConnectService : public BasicService {
00085 public:
00086     using conn_scok_type = std::vector<lsf::asio::SharedSocket>;
00087     using BasicService::ConnectionSend;
00088     static const size_t DEF_CONN_CHECK_INTERVAL = 10*1000; // milli seconds
00089     static const size_t DEF_CONNECT_TIMEOUT = 5*1000; // milli seconds
00090     static const size_t DEF_KEEP_SAME_INDEX_INTERVAL = 100; // milli seconds
00091     friend class lsf::asio::ProactorSerivce;
00092     friend class BasicService;
00093 
00094 public:
00095     BasicConnectService(conf::ENServiceType service_type) : BasicService(service_type) {}
00096     virtual ~BasicConnectService() {}
00097 
00098     bool ConnectionSendBySequence(google::protobuf::Message const& message);
00099     bool ConnectionSendBySequence(std::string const& message);
00100     bool ConnectionSendByIndex(size_t index, google::protobuf::Message const& message);
00101     bool ConnectionSendByIndex(size_t index, std::string const& message);
00102 
00103 protected:
00104     // most of time you should not mess with these funcs
00105     virtual void OnSocketConnect(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, lsf::asio::SockAddr const& sockaddr, size_t index) final;
00106     virtual void OnSocketConnectFail(lsf::asio::SharedSocket socket, lsf::asio::SockAddr const& sockaddr) final;
00107 
00108     // init logic
00109     virtual bool OnInitConfig();
00110     virtual bool OnInitSocket();
00111     virtual void OnConnectionCheck(int timer_fd);
00112 
00113 protected:
00114     size_t _last_random_send_index = 0;
00115     uint64_t _last_send_time = 0;
00116     conf::ConnectService _service_config;
00117     conn_scok_type _conn_scok;
00118 };
